title: Midori
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Japanese, Buffet, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a weekday vegetarian and vegan lunch buffet which includes many faux meat dishes. There is also a special green menu-card (with English translation) for vegetarian and vegan dishes, and most dishes can be made vegan using faux meat (faux duck, faux calamari, etc.).
